_source.text: Additionally, if the team can make the story and gameplay flow as well as or even better than the stunning Dead Space Extraction (still one of the best M-rated Wii games ever and even more superior on the PS3 with the Move controls), they'll have folks who like a decent narrative hooked in from the time they press Start.

text: Additionally, if the team can make the story and gameplay flow as well as or even **better** **than** the
